entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:43 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 7:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Humidity: 36 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -22.4°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
